name: BlazBlue: Chronophantasma Extend
content:
game:
  appid: 388750
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: quartz
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: devenum
    arch: win32
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Windows Media Player 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: winxp
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\Steam.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    value: win7
winesteam:
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: staging-3.16-i386
